content.query:
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS sapcrm.view_CSALESBI2
GO

CREATE VIEW sap_crm.view_CSALESBI2 AS
SELECT
[0BP_GUID]
,[0INFOPROV]
,[0RECORDTP]
,[0REQTSN]
,[4CSALESBI2_ADD_ORDERED]
,[4CSALESBI2_AMOUNT_ZONES]
,[ZBPARTNER___T]
,[ZZWEBSTAH]
,[4CSALESBI2_PAID_AMT]
,[ZZWEBSTAH___T]
,[FRA_ZONE___T]
,[MSH_ID___T]
,[SALECHAN]
,[SALECHAN___T]
,[TIL_STAT___T]
,[TIL_ZONE___T]
,[TIL_STAT]
,[TIL_ZONE]
,[ZBPARTNER]
,[4CSALESBI2_REFUND_AMT]
,[4CSALESBI2_TOTALPRICE]
,[FRA_STAT___T]
,[4CSALESBI2_VALID_FROM_T]
,[4CSALESBI2_VALID_TO_DAT]
,[4CSALESBI2_VALID_TO_TIM]
,[FRA_STAT]
,[FRA_ZONE]
,[MSH_ID]
,[4CSALESBI2_TRIP_DURATIO]
,[4CSALESBI2_TRV_END_DATE]
,[4CSALESBI2_TRV_END_TIME]
,[4CSALESBI2_TRV_START_DA]
,[4CSALESBI2_TRV_START_TI]
,[4CSALESBI2_VALID_FROM_D]
,[4CSALESBI2_SEAT_EXISTS]
,[4CSALESBI2_SEAT_ID]
,[4CSALESBI2_SEAT_NO]
,[4CSALESBI2_TICKET_ID]
,[4CSALESBI2_TRAIN_NR]
,[4CSALESBI2_TRAIN_TYPE]
,[4CSALESBI2_PLACEOFBOOKI]
,[4CSALESBI2_PLACEOFSALES]
,[4CSALESBI2_PROCESS_NR]
,[4CSALESBI2_RECORDMODE_]
,[4CSALESBI2_SALES_REP]
,[4CSALESBI2_SALE_DATE]
,[4CSALESBI2_NUM_OF_RTRDP]
,[4CSALESBI2_ORDERED_PROD]
,[4CSALESBI2_REFUND]
,[1ROWCOUNT]
,[4CSALESBI2_CURRENCY___T]
,[4CSALESBI2_NUM_OF_ACCHI]
,[4CSALESBI2_LASTLOGTIME]
,[4CSALESBI2_LOGTIME]
,[4CSALESBI2_MKT_PERM_IND]
,[4CSALESBI2_NUM_OF_ADULT]
,[4CSALESBI2_NUM_OF_CHILD]
,[4CSALESBI2_NUM_OF_JUVEN]
,[4CSALESBI2_CURRENCY]
,[4CSALESBI2_DELIVERY_EMA]
,[4CSALESBI2_EXT_CFNAME]
,[4CSALESBI2_EXT_CLNAME]
,[4CSALESBI2_EXT_CUSTID]
,[4CSALESBI2_EXT_ORDER]
,[4CSALESBI2_BOOKING_NR]
,[4CSALESBI2_CHANGE_DATE]
,[4CSALESBI2_CHANGE_TIME]
,[4CSALESBI2_COMMUTER_CAR]
,[4CSALESBI2_CREATE_DATE]
,[4CSALESBI2_CREATE_TIME]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'sapcrm/CSALESBI2.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'sapcrm',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS CSALESBI2;
